Tool Status

  • Production
  • Installation
  • Maintenance
  • Idle

Cumulative Analytics For Lab

Productive Time in% =
Productive Time in hrs from start date / Total time of hours(Production/Installation/Config/Maintenance)
* 100
Maintenance Time in% =
Maintenance Time in hours from start date / Total time of hours(Production/Installation/Config/Maintenance)
* 100
Idle Time in% =
Idle Time in hours from start date / Total time of hours(Production/Installation/Config/Maintenance)
* 100
Installation /config Time in% =
Installation/config in hours from start date / Total time of hours(Production/Installation/Config/Maintenance)
* 100

Concept & Proto Lab

The floor plan contains the real-time status of the all the bays/tools. The tools which are in Productive state is highlighted in green color .Similarly, Yellow color represents the Install/Config state, Blue color represents Maintenance state and Red color represents Idle state.

Productive When tool is running that time user or tool owner has to change the productive mode.

Idle time Unproductive time on the part of employees or machines as a result of factors beyond their control.
Idle time is the time associated with waiting, or when a piece of machinery is not being used but could be.
Idle time could also be associated with computing, and in that case refers to processing time.

Maintenance Preventive maintenance (PM, the care and servicing by personnel for the purpose of maintaining.
Preventive maintenance tends to follow planned guidelines from time-to-time to prevent equipment and Tools during the time will be change the tool status of maintenance.

Installation/config Any materials required for the particular tool then will be change the status of tool installation/config.

Vacant In the lay out which tools are not assigned to the console that tool representing white color.
